name: heimdall-monorepo
description: Heimdall Discord Bot with Web Dashboard - Monorepo

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd bot && bun run dev" "cd dashboard && bun run dev"
scripts.build: cd bot && bun run build && cd ../dashboard && bun run build
scripts.start: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" --names "bot,dashboard" "cd bot && bun run start" "cd dashboard && bun run start"
scripts.install:all: cd logger && bun install && bun run build && cd ../command-handler && bun install && bun run build && cd ../bot && bun install && bun run build && cd ../dashboard && bun install && bun run build
scripts.db:push: cd dashboard && bunx prisma db push
